author: Ron Wilkinson
content: Great, makes me want to visit the place.

author: ws
content:
MCM Mine Countermeasures Ships:
Non-Magnetic hulls, Non-Magnetic Isotta Fraschini Diesel Engines,
All systems are non-magnetic..
The Isotta Fraschini, was Gloria Swanson’s luxury car in Sunset Boulevard..
This is a very special diesel engine, and because of that uniqueness, no ferritic
components are contaminating the supply chain..
